name: b-blocks/test-purpose
title: Faq
description: Short description of the Test Purpose

default.title: Frequently asked Questions
default.description: Discover clarity and insights as we unravel answers to your questions

faqItems.question: Does BTCPayServer cost extra?
faqItems.answer: No, BTCPayServer is completely free and open-source software.

faqItems.question: Does my Voltage Lightning Node connect to BTC Server automatically?
faqItems.answer: Yes. After you deploy your Lightning Node, you can click the BTCPayServer icon on the node dashboard to easily start your BTCPayServer which connects to your node automatically.

faqItems.question: Can I accept payments on chain?
faqItems.answer: Yes, you can accept both on-chain and Lightning payments through the platform.
